string.name: name
string.value: The Messenger of the Toy Palace 1

string.name: parent
string.value: The Messenger of the Toy Palace
#p2041004#, the security guard of #m220000000#, has something in plan for me. I should go visit #p2041004#.

I went to #m220000000# to visit #p2041004#, the security guard of #m220000000#, because he had an offer for me. #p2041004# requested that I, as a representative of the #m220000000# castle, visit a place called #m240000000#, and if I was really interested in heading there as a messenger of #m220000000#, then I should eliminate #r10 Ratz, 10 Black Ratz, and 10 Red Ratz#k first.

Retz #r#a32421##k
Black Ratz #r#a32422##k
Ratz #r#a32423##k

At the suggestion from #p2041004#, the security guard of #m220000000#, I headed to #m240000000# as the messenger of #m220000000#. #p2041004# graciously provided me with #b#t4161013##k. What's the item I'm supposed to give him, though?
당신의 도전정신을 시험해 보시지 않겠습니까? #m220000000#에서는 이번에 새롭게 발견된 지역인 #m240000000# 마을과 우호관계를 맺기위해 전령사를 보내기로 결정했습니다. #m220000000#을 대표하는 전령사가 되고 싶지 않으신가요?
#m220000000#을 대표하는 전령사가 되기 위해서는 몇 가지 자격조건이 필요합니다. 장기간 여행을 해도 될 정도로 건강하다는 것을 증명하기 위해 탑에 서식하는 #r#o3110102# 10마리, #o3210205# 10마리, #o3210208# 10마리#k를 잡고 돌아와 주세요.
#m220000000#을 대표한다는 것은 정말 명예로운 일이 될텐데요. 물론 #m220000000#에서는 각종 지원을 아끼지 않을 것입니다.

Are you seeking for new challenges? Are you interested in some action? Well, #m220000000# is trying to set up a friendly affair with the newly-discovered town of #m240000000#, and we'd like to send a messenger on their way. Would you like to become the messenger that represents #m220000000#?

In order to become the messenger of #m220000000#, you'll need to pass a test. In order to prove that you are healthy enough to endure long-distance journeys, please kill #r10 #o3110102#s, 10 #o3210205#s, and 10 #o3210208#s#k. They can all be found in the tower.
Representing #m220000000# will be the greatest honor of your life! Of course, #m220000000# will be supporting your every step.
Unbelievable. You are more than qualified to become our messenger. I'll now give you the items that should be provided to you from #m220000000#.
